name: WHITE SHAPES
description:
A princess has disappeared. The protagonist finds himself in a village full of strange people, who don't seem to know him. There is a great concern given the disappearance of the princess, but the protagonist doesn't seem worried...

A 2D adventure game about a guy who is looking for a princess in a village full of strange people!

WASD: movement

MOUSE: interact

REMINDER: This game has been made in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2021
